thread.title: China’s AirMedia Reaches Agreement for Management-Led Buyout
thread.title_full: China’s AirMedia Reaches Agreement for Management-Led Buyout - WSJ

author: Nathan Becker
title: China’s AirMedia Reaches Agreement for Management-Led Buyout
text:
AirMedia Group Inc. on Wednesday said it reached a deal with a group of its executives to take the company private with an offer that values the firm at about $360 million, following a raft of management offers earlier this year to take Chinese companies off the U.S. market.
AirMedia, which operates ad platforms targeting high-end customers as well as those traveling by rail or air, said its holders will receive $6 per American... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
